text: Picture Perfect Morning is the solo debut album by American singer-songwriter Edie Brickell, released in 1994 (see 1994 in music). The video for "Good Times" was included as part of the multimedia samples included on Microsoft's Windows 95 Companion CD-ROM. ==Track listing== All tracks written by Edie Brickell. #"Tomorrow Comes"
